title: Hidden Hall of Zakas
story: After being destroyed by a terrible earthquake a millenium ago the hall of Zakas remained deserted. Lately a party of ogres rediscovered it, making it their headquarters. Rumors say that untold treasures of magical artifacts can be found here.

notes.text: A rear entrance into the hall. A great door with a keyhole to the south.
A key in a reinforced trunk.
